service_template.tool.message: Error 500: Internal server error - The service encountered an unexpected error while processing the request.
Error 503: Service unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request to the service timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - Too many requests to the service. Please try again in a few seconds.
Error 403: Permission denied - You do not have the required permissions to perform this action.
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid parameters provided.
Error 404: Not found - The requested resource was not found.
